attributes.action: Give British expats voting rights in UK parliamentary elections for life
attributes.background: Expats who've lived overseas for more than 15 years lose the right to vote in UK parliamentary elections. The UK is the only country in the G7 that denies its citizens this fundamental right. This is unjust as British citizens abroad remain directly affected by the policies of the UK government.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Enable UK expats to have votes for life
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561581

Remove the 15 year rule on British expats voting in UK General Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559243
